price: 24.ama korosuk sin Rabbi Nabii Mucammadal ﷺ maca oobiseeh keenik axcuk ken essereenik, naharsi marih hayyayyoonaa kee deedal akke waytek oobisem mali iyyan.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū asāṭīru al-awalīna
